reviewText: This book didn't tell me how to make diamonds or anything about diamonds at all.
Great instruction from a great Instructor.
Great video with awesome instruction an drills.
would be great if you could print out the drills (to take to the range)

This is a well thought out and put together DVD that takes what you learn from Garret's previous DVD ULTIMATE ISRAELI INSTINCTIVE SHOOTING AND PISTOL COMBAT TRAINING dvd and shows you how to put it into practice at your local gun range. Based on real training used by and taught to elite special forces this is based on real world scenarios. Full explanations of the drill beforehand and a review afterward covers all angles-dual camerawork enhances the viewing with a camera on the shooter and a camera on the target. I am looking forward to putting some of these drills into practice when i next hit the range!!

I recommend this book to all security, police and military personnel if you have ever studied the way the IDF fight and train you will appreciate this book and how well the author explains the how and why things are done...
